snippet: Dr. Jan Chozen Bays, a pediatrician and meditation teacher in Oregon and the author of a guide to mindful eating, will answer your questions on the philosophy and practice of eating thoughtfully.
abstract: Dr. Jan Chozen Bays, a pediatrician and meditation teacher in Oregon and the author of a guide to mindful eating, will answer your questions on the philosophy and practice of eating thoughtfully.

headline.main: Q. and A. on Mindful Eating
